'''1.7.10 Build 20'''<ref>{{link |url=http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog|title=MinecraftEdu Changelog|date=|website=|author=}}([https://web.archive.org/web/20170207182304/http://services.minecraftedu.com/wiki/Changelog Archive])</ref> is the twentieth build for {{El|MinecraftEdu}} 1.7.10, released on July 2, 2015. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.7.10]]. This is the final build in 2015.

== Additions ==
* ComputerCraftEdu is now bundled with MinecraftEdu.
* "Turtles can build" setting to ComputerCraftEdu teacher menu.
* ComputerCraftEdu settings to Server.
* German translation.

== Fixes ==
'''2 bugs fixed'''
* Not being able to spawn animals if monsters were disabled.
* Users not being able to run and potions not increasing movement speed.
